author: shazron
msg: Deprecated the Camera.getPicture API. This will be removed in 1.0 (into the Plugins repo). Use the Media Capture API instead.

msg: Now correctly calling the error callback when there is no camera available on the device.

author: shazron
msg: Workaround to handled 'orientationchange' events in iOS 3.x

author: shazron
msg: In iOS 3.x, window.dispatchEvent does not exist, so we fallback to document.dispatchEvent
